document_data.caption: A map showing the Codsbay Mire on the Strait of Oman.
document_data.name: Codsbay Mire
document_data.mainbody: The '''Codsbay Mire''' was a marshland located on the island of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}}
document_data.Geography: The marsh was found in northern Gwynneth where the [[Codsrun Creek]] delta met the [[Strait of Oman]] on the [[Sea of Moonshae]]. Both ends of the marsh covered the [[Codsbay]], covering approximately {{SI|500|sq mi|k|long=yes}} including the numerous unnamed small islands within the delta.
document_data.Notable Locations: The ruins of the village of [[Manger]] sat on the southwest border of the Codsbay Mire.
